h3cStorageSnap.name: h3cStorageSnap
h3cStorageSnap.contactinfo: Platform Team H3C Technologies Co., Ltd. Hai-Dian District Beijing P.R. China Http://www.h3c.com Zip:100085
h3cStorageSnap.description: This MIB describes the general information about snap of storage device.

h3cAddtionalSpaceMaxSize.name: h3cAddtionalSpaceMaxSize
h3cAddtionalSpaceMaxSize.description: This object identifies the maximal size of snapshot resource, safecache, and Continued replication Resource .

h3cSnapConfigTable.name: h3cSnapConfigTable
h3cSnapConfigTable.description: This table contains some entity to config the snapshot resources for special logic volumes.

h3cSnapConfigEntry.name: h3cSnapConfigEntry
h3cSnapConfigEntry.description: An entry containing configuration about the snapshot resource.

h3cSnapLvIndex.name: h3cSnapLvIndex
h3cSnapLvIndex.description: This object identifies the index of h3cSnapConfigTable. The object identified by this index is the same object as identified by the same value of h3cLvIndex.

h3cSnapAreaId.name: h3cSnapAreaId
h3cSnapAreaId.description: This object identifies the snapshot resource of the logic volume.

h3cSnapAreaAutoExpand.name: h3cSnapAreaAutoExpand
h3cSnapAreaAutoExpand.description: This object describes if the space of snapshot resource can be expanded automatically.

h3cSnapAreaThreshold.name: h3cSnapAreaThreshold
h3cSnapAreaThreshold.description: If h3cSnapAreaAutoExpand is selected, the 'h3cSnapAreaThreshold' means the threshold of the snapshot resource.

h3cSnapAreaIncSize.name: h3cSnapAreaIncSize
h3cSnapAreaIncSize.description: If h3cSnapAreaAutoExpand is selected, the 'h3cSnapAreaIncSize' means the amount of space to be allocated for each expansion.

h3cSnapAreaMaxSize.name: h3cSnapAreaMaxSize
h3cSnapAreaMaxSize.description: If h3cSnapAreaAutoExpand is selected, the 'h3cSnapAreaIncSize' means the max size of snapshot resource.

h3cSnapAreaFullDeleteTM.name: h3cSnapAreaFullDeleteTM
h3cSnapAreaFullDeleteTM.description: This object identifies if the snapshot resource is out of space and expand failed, if the system delete the old timemark until enough space or not.

h3cSnapAreaNotify.name: h3cSnapAreaNotify
h3cSnapAreaNotify.description: This object describes if a snapshot notification should be send to the client when the system create a timemark.

h3cSnapAreaStatus.name: h3cSnapAreaStatus
h3cSnapAreaStatus.description: This object describes the state of the snapshot resource.

h3cSnapRaidUuid.name: h3cSnapRaidUuid
h3cSnapRaidUuid.description: This object describes the raid where the snapshot resource is created.

h3cSnapRaidSize.name: h3cSnapRaidSize
h3cSnapRaidSize.description: This object describes the size designated when the snapshot resource is created.

h3cSnapRaidSelectPolicy.name: h3cSnapRaidSelectPolicy
h3cSnapRaidSelectPolicy.description: This object describes the policy when the snapshot resource is created automatically. Note that the value can not be 'none' when the value of associated h3cSnapRaidUuid object is equal to null.

h3cSnapAreaTotalSize.name: h3cSnapAreaTotalSize
h3cSnapAreaTotalSize.description: This object identifies the current total size of the snapshot resource.

h3cSnapAreaFreeSize.name: h3cSnapAreaFreeSize
h3cSnapAreaFreeSize.description: This object identifies the free size of the snapshot resource.

h3cSnapExtendTimes.name: h3cSnapExtendTimes
h3cSnapExtendTimes.description: This object identifies the times the snapshot resource extended.

h3cSnapRowStatus.name: h3cSnapRowStatus
h3cSnapRowStatus.description: This object identifies the action of snapshot resource. Note that the assocai snapshot resource can not be delete when a snapshot copy is processing or the TimeMark is enabled, or the replication is enabled.

h3cSnapExpandTable.name: h3cSnapExpandTable
h3cSnapExpandTable.description: This table contains some entity to expand a snapshot resource.

h3cSnapExpandEntry.name: h3cSnapExpandEntry
h3cSnapExpandEntry.description: An entry containing expand information applicable to the snapshot resource.

h3cSAExpRaidUuid.name: h3cSAExpRaidUuid
h3cSAExpRaidUuid.description: This index is identical to h3cRaidUuid in H3C-RAID-MIB.

h3cSAExpSize.name: h3cSAExpSize
h3cSAExpSize.description: This object describes the increased size for snapshot resource when expanded. The units is million bytes. The value is always equal to zero when read.

h3cSAExpRaidSize.name: h3cSAExpRaidSize
h3cSAExpRaidSize.description: This object describes the size for snapshot resource on the raid. The units is million bytes. The value is always equal to zero when read.

h3cSnapAreaExpRowStatus.name: h3cSnapAreaExpRowStatus
h3cSnapAreaExpRowStatus.description: This object describes the actions to expand the size for snap.

h3cSnapCopyTable.name: h3cSnapCopyTable
h3cSnapCopyTable.description: This table contains some entity about snapshot copy.

h3cSnapCopyEntry.name: h3cSnapCopyEntry
h3cSnapCopyEntry.description: An entry containing snapshot copy information applicable.

h3cSnapCopyLvIndex.name: h3cSnapCopyLvIndex
h3cSnapCopyLvIndex.description: This object identifies the index of destination logic volume for snapshot copy.

h3cSnapCopyPercentage.name: h3cSnapCopyPercentage
h3cSnapCopyPercentage.description: This object identifies the percentage of snapshot copy. The value is equal to zero if the snapshot copy has not started. When finished, the value is always equal to '100'.

h3cSnapCopyStartTime.name: h3cSnapCopyStartTime
h3cSnapCopyStartTime.description: This object identifies the time to start the snapshot copy.

h3cSnapCopySwitch.name: h3cSnapCopySwitch
h3cSnapCopySwitch.description: This object describes the actions to start or stop the snapshot copy. When read, the value of 'none' will be get. Note that if the snapshot resource of source logic volume has not been created, the action of snapshot copy will be refused by agent.

h3cTimeMarkConfigTable.name: h3cTimeMarkConfigTable
h3cTimeMarkConfigTable.description: This table contains some entity to config a TimeMark on a special logic volume.

h3cTimeMarkConfigEntry.name: h3cTimeMarkConfigEntry
h3cTimeMarkConfigEntry.description: An entry containing config information applicable to the TimeMark.

h3cTimeMarkCounts.name: h3cTimeMarkCounts
h3cTimeMarkCounts.description: This object identifies the max num of TimeMark which can be configed.

h3cTimeMarkInitializeTime.name: h3cTimeMarkInitializeTime
h3cTimeMarkInitializeTime.description: This object identifies the date and time when the first TimeMark is created on the logic volume.

h3cTimeMarkInterval.name: h3cTimeMarkInterval
h3cTimeMarkInterval.description: This object identifies the interval when the TimeMark is created automatically if the value of this object is not equal to zero. The units is second. the min value is 10 seconds.

h3cTimeMarkLastTime.name: h3cTimeMarkLastTime
h3cTimeMarkLastTime.description: This object identifies the date and time when the latest TimeMark is created on the logic volume.

h3cTimeMarkTotal.name: h3cTimeMarkTotal
h3cTimeMarkTotal.description: This object identifies the current num of TimeMark.

h3cTimeMarkSwitch.name: h3cTimeMarkSwitch
h3cTimeMarkSwitch.description: This object describes enable or disable TimeMark.

h3cTimeMarkCreateTable.name: h3cTimeMarkCreateTable
h3cTimeMarkCreateTable.description: This table contains some entity to create a TimeMark on a special logic volume.

h3cTimeMarkCreateEntry.name: h3cTimeMarkCreateEntry
h3cTimeMarkCreateEntry.description: An entry containing create information applicable to the TimeMark.

h3cTimeMarkStamp.name: h3cTimeMarkStamp
h3cTimeMarkStamp.description: This object identifies the date and time the TimeMark is created.

h3cTimeMarkComment.name: h3cTimeMarkComment
h3cTimeMarkComment.description: This object identifies the comment of the TimeMark.

h3cTimeMarkSize.name: h3cTimeMarkSize
h3cTimeMarkSize.description: This object identifies the current size of the TimeMark.

h3cTimeMarkRowStatus.name: h3cTimeMarkRowStatus
h3cTimeMarkRowStatus.description: This object identifies the action to create or delete the TimeMark. Note that the TimeMark can not be deleted if it is using.

h3cTimeMarkCopyTable.name: h3cTimeMarkCopyTable
h3cTimeMarkCopyTable.description: This table contains some entity about a TimeMark copy.

h3cTimeMarkCopyEntry.name: h3cTimeMarkCopyEntry
h3cTimeMarkCopyEntry.description: An entry containing config information applicable to the TimeMark copy.

h3cTMCopyDestLvId.name: h3cTMCopyDestLvId
h3cTMCopyDestLvId.description: This object identifies the index of destination logic volume for TimeMark copy.

h3cTMCopyPercentage.name: h3cTMCopyPercentage
h3cTMCopyPercentage.description: This object identifies the percentage of TimeMark copy. The value is equal to zero if the TimeMark copy has not started. When finished, the value is always equal to '100'.

h3cTMCopyStartTime.name: h3cTMCopyStartTime
h3cTMCopyStartTime.description: This object identifies the time to start the TimeMark copy.

h3cTMCopySwitch.name: h3cTMCopySwitch
h3cTMCopySwitch.description: This object describes the actions to start or stop the TimeMark copy. When read, the value of 'none' will be get.

h3cTimeMarkRollbackTable.name: h3cTimeMarkRollbackTable
h3cTimeMarkRollbackTable.description: This table contains some entity to use a TimeMark to rollback the logic volume.

h3cTimeMarkRollbackEntry.name: h3cTimeMarkRollbackEntry
h3cTimeMarkRollbackEntry.description: An entry containing config information applicable to use a TimeMark to rollback the logic volume.

h3cTMRollbackPercentage.name: h3cTMRollbackPercentage
h3cTMRollbackPercentage.description: This object identifies the percentage of rollback.

h3cTMRollbackStartTime.name: h3cTMRollbackStartTime
h3cTMRollbackStartTime.description: This object identifies the time to start the rollback.

h3cTMRollbackSwitch.name: h3cTMRollbackSwitch
h3cTMRollbackSwitch.description: This object describes the actions to use a TimeMark to rollback the logic volume. Note that once you roll back, you cannot roll forward, all the later TimeMark behind it will be deleted.

h3cTimeViewTable.name: h3cTimeViewTable
h3cTimeViewTable.description: This table contains some entity to config a TimeView on a special TimeMark.

h3cTimeViewEntry.name: h3cTimeViewEntry
h3cTimeViewEntry.description: An entry containing config information applicable to the TimeView.

h3cTimeViewStamp.name: h3cTimeViewStamp
h3cTimeViewStamp.description: This object identifies the TimeView. The object identified by this index is the same object as identified by the same value of h3cTimeMarkStamp.

h3cTimeViewName.name: h3cTimeViewName
h3cTimeViewName.description: This object identifies the name of the TimeView.

h3cTimeViewRowStatus.name: h3cTimeViewRowStatus
h3cTimeViewRowStatus.description: This object describes the actions to create or delete the TimeView.

h3cReplicaConfigTable.name: h3cReplicaConfigTable
h3cReplicaConfigTable.description: This table contains some entity to config replication for a logic volume.

h3cReplicaConfigEntry.name: h3cReplicaConfigEntry
h3cReplicaConfigEntry.description: An entry containing config information applicable to the replication for a logic volume.

h3cRepLocalLvIndex.name: h3cRepLocalLvIndex
h3cRepLocalLvIndex.description: This object identifies the local logic volume that is related with replication. The object identified by this index is the same object as identified by the same value of h3cSnapLvIndex.

h3cLvRepLocalWay.name: h3cLvRepLocalWay
h3cLvRepLocalWay.description: The value of 'outgoing' means the h3cRepLocalLvIndex is the primary logic volume of replication, and the h3cRepRemoteLvIndex is the replica logic volume. The value of 'incoming' means the h3cRepLocalLvIndex is the replica logic volume of replication. , and the h3cRepRemoteLvIndex is the primary logic volume.

h3cRepLocalServerIP.name: h3cRepLocalServerIP
h3cRepLocalServerIP.description: This object identifies the ip address of local server.

h3cRepLocalServerIPType.name: h3cRepLocalServerIPType
h3cRepLocalServerIPType.description: This object identifies the ip address type of local server.

h3cRepLocalServerName.name: h3cRepLocalServerName
h3cRepLocalServerName.description: This object identifies the name of local server.

h3cRepLocalServerUsername.name: h3cRepLocalServerUsername
h3cRepLocalServerUsername.description: This object identifies the username of local server.

h3cRepLocalServerPassword.name: h3cRepLocalServerPassword
h3cRepLocalServerPassword.description: This object identifies the password of local server.

h3cRepRemoteServerIP.name: h3cRepRemoteServerIP
h3cRepRemoteServerIP.description: This object identifies the ip address of remote server.

h3cRepRemoteServerIPType.name: h3cRepRemoteServerIPType
h3cRepRemoteServerIPType.description: This object identifies the ip address type of remote server.

h3cRepRemoteServerName.name: h3cRepRemoteServerName
h3cRepRemoteServerName.description: This object identifies the name of remote server.

h3cRepRemoteServerUsername.name: h3cRepRemoteServerUsername
h3cRepRemoteServerUsername.description: This object identifies the username of remote server.

h3cRepRemoteServerPassword.name: h3cRepRemoteServerPassword
h3cRepRemoteServerPassword.description: This object identifies the password of remote server.

h3cRepRemoteLvIndex.name: h3cRepRemoteLvIndex
h3cRepRemoteLvIndex.description: This object identifies the logic volume of remote server.

h3cReplicaMode.name: h3cReplicaMode
h3cReplicaMode.description: This object identifies the replication mode: The value of 'adaptive' means that data from the primary resource is continuously replicated to a replica resource unless the system determines it is not practical or possible. The value of 'remote' means that a snapshot is taken of the primary resource at prescribed intervals based on the criteria you set (schedule and/or watermark value). Note that the associated Continuous Replication Resource can not be created if the value of this boject is not equal to 'adaptive'.

h3cReplicaWatermark.name: h3cReplicaWatermark
h3cReplicaWatermark.description: This object identifies the size of watermark which means a replication is scheduled.

h3cReplicaWatermarkRetry.name: h3cReplicaWatermarkRetry
h3cReplicaWatermarkRetry.description: If the 'h3cReplicaWatermark' is set, This object identifies the interval time to retry if the last replication is failed. The units is minute.

h3cReplicaInitializeTime.name: h3cReplicaInitializeTime
h3cReplicaInitializeTime.description: This object identifies the time to start an initial replication.

h3cReplicaInterval.name: h3cReplicaInterval
h3cReplicaInterval.description: This object identifies how often the replication should be repeated after initial replication. The units is minute.

h3cReplicaEncrypt.name: h3cReplicaEncrypt
h3cReplicaEncrypt.description: This object identifies the encrypt option is enable or diable.

h3cReplicaCompress.name: h3cReplicaCompress
h3cReplicaCompress.description: This object identifies the compress option is enable or diable.

h3cReplicaUseExistTM.name: h3cReplicaUseExistTM
h3cReplicaUseExistTM.description: This object identifies if using the exist TimeMark to replicate or not.

h3cReplicaProtocol.name: h3cReplicaProtocol
h3cReplicaProtocol.description: This object identifies the protocol about replication. The value 'tcp' means Transmission Control Protocol, and 'rudp' means Reliable User Datagram Protocol.

h3cReplicaScanDiff.name: h3cReplicaScanDiff
h3cReplicaScanDiff.description: This object identifies the system to scan both the primary and replica resource to determine how much data needs to be synchronized.

h3cReplicaStatSwitch.name: h3cReplicaStatSwitch
h3cReplicaStatSwitch.description: This object identifies the action how to operate the replica. When read , a value of 'none' will be get. The value of 'promte' means remove the replication relation and promote the remote copy on the target server. The value of 'sync' means synchronize mannually (force a replication that is not scheduled.) The value of 'scan' means scan the delta data between primary resource and replica resource. The value of 'reversal' means switch the roles of the primary resource and replica resource. The replication configuration is maintained. The primary and replica must be synchronized in order to reverse a replica. The value of 'stop' means stop a replication that is currently in progress. The value of 'suspend' means suspend future replications from automatically being triggered by replication policies (watermark, interval, time). This will not stop a replication that is currently in progress. The value of 'resume' means resume the replication status from suspended to normal. Note that if the action of 'upgrade' is executed successfully, this replica resource will become a normal logic volume, and this entry will be deleted automatically. Note that if the action of 'reversal' is executed successfully, Clients will be disconnected from the former primary resource.

h3cReplicaRowStatus.name: h3cReplicaRowStatus
h3cReplicaRowStatus.description: This object identifies the action to enable or disable the replication.

h3cReplicaStateTable.name: h3cReplicaStateTable
h3cReplicaStateTable.description: This table contains some entity to show replication state.

h3cReplicaStateEntry.name: h3cReplicaStateEntry
h3cReplicaStateEntry.description: An entry containing show information applicable to the replication state.

h3cReplicaDelta.name: h3cReplicaDelta
h3cReplicaDelta.description: This object identifies the size of delta data after last sync.

h3cReplicaLastSyncTime.name: h3cReplicaLastSyncTime
h3cReplicaLastSyncTime.description: This object identifies the date and time when last sync is taken.

h3cReplicaNextSyncTime.name: h3cReplicaNextSyncTime
h3cReplicaNextSyncTime.description: This object identifies the date and time when next sync will be taken.

h3cReplicaSyncTotalSize.name: h3cReplicaSyncTotalSize
h3cReplicaSyncTotalSize.description: This object identifies how much data need to be synchronized to the replica resource for current replication.

h3cReplicaSyncCurPercentage.name: h3cReplicaSyncCurPercentage
h3cReplicaSyncCurPercentage.description: This object identifies how much data has been synchronized to the replica resource for current replication.

h3cReplicaSyncPerformance.name: h3cReplicaSyncPerformance
h3cReplicaSyncPerformance.description: This object identifies the performance of the synchronize. The unit is MB/s.

h3cReplicaRunStatus.name: h3cReplicaRunStatus
h3cReplicaRunStatus.description: This object identifies the state of the replica.

h3cCDRConfigTable.name: h3cCDRConfigTable
h3cCDRConfigTable.description: This table contains some entity to config Continuous Replication Resource.

h3cCDRConfigEntry.name: h3cCDRConfigEntry
h3cCDRConfigEntry.description: An entry containing some information applicable to Continuous Replication Resource of the logic volume.

h3cCDRLvIndex.name: h3cCDRLvIndex
h3cCDRLvIndex.description: This object identifies the source logic volume of the Continuous Replication Resource. The object identified by this index is the same object as identified by the same value of h3cRepLocalLvIndex. Note that an entry of h3cCDRConfigTable can be created only when the associated h3cCDRDistributeTable's objects is ready or the associated select policy is not equal to 'none'. If an entry is deleted, the associated h3cCDRDistributeTable objects should be deleted automatically.

h3cCDRID.name: h3cCDRID
h3cCDRID.description: This object identifies the Continuous Replication Resource.

h3cCDRStatus.name: h3cCDRStatus
h3cCDRStatus.description: This object identifies the state of the Continuous Replication Resource.

h3cCDRTotalSize.name: h3cCDRTotalSize
h3cCDRTotalSize.description: This object identifies the total size of the Continuous Replication Resource.

h3cCDRFreeSize.name: h3cCDRFreeSize
h3cCDRFreeSize.description: This object identifies the free size of the Continuous Replication Resource.

h3cCDRSelectPolicy.name: h3cCDRSelectPolicy
h3cCDRSelectPolicy.description: This object describes the policy about allocating the space for Continuous Replication Resource.

h3cCDRRowStatus.name: h3cCDRRowStatus
h3cCDRRowStatus.description: This object identifies the action to create or delete the Continuous Replication Resource.

h3cCDRDistributeTable.name: h3cCDRDistributeTable
h3cCDRDistributeTable.description: This table contains some entity to config the distribution of Continuous Replication Resource.

h3cCDRDistributeEntry.name: h3cCDRDistributeEntry
h3cCDRDistributeEntry.description: An entry containing some information applicable to the distribution of Continuous Replication Resource.

h3cCDRDistLvIndex.name: h3cCDRDistLvIndex
h3cCDRDistLvIndex.description: This index is identical to h3cLvIndex in H3C-LOGIC-VOLUME-MIB.

h3cCDRRaidUuid.name: h3cCDRRaidUuid
h3cCDRRaidUuid.description: This index is identical to h3cRaidUuid in H3C-RAID-MIB.

h3cCDRRaidSize.name: h3cCDRRaidSize
h3cCDRRaidSize.description: This object identifies the size on the special raid distributed for the Continuous Replication Resource.

h3cCDRExtRowStatus.name: h3cCDRExtRowStatus
h3cCDRExtRowStatus.description: This object identifies the action to create the distribution for the Continuous Replication Resource.

h3cSafeCacheConfigTable.name: h3cSafeCacheConfigTable
h3cSafeCacheConfigTable.description: This table contains some entity to config SafeCache.

h3cSafeCacheConfigEntry.name: h3cSafeCacheConfigEntry
h3cSafeCacheConfigEntry.description: An entry containing some information applicable to SafeCache of the logic volume.

h3cSafeCacheLvIndex.name: h3cSafeCacheLvIndex
h3cSafeCacheLvIndex.description: This object identifies the source logic volume of the SafeCache. The object identified by this index is the same object as identified by the same value of h3cLvindex. Note that an entry of h3cSafeCacheConfigTable can be created only when the associated h3cSafeCacheDistributeTable's objects is ready or the associated select policy is not equal to 'none'. If an entry is deleted, the associated h3cSafeCacheDistributeTable objects should be deleted automatically.

h3cSafeCacheStatus.name: h3cSafeCacheStatus
h3cSafeCacheStatus.description: This object identifies the state of the SafeCache.

h3cSafeCacheTotalSize.name: h3cSafeCacheTotalSize
h3cSafeCacheTotalSize.description: This object identifies the total size of the SafeCache. The units is million bytes.

h3cSafeCacheFreeSize.name: h3cSafeCacheFreeSize
h3cSafeCacheFreeSize.description: This object identifies the free size of the SafeCache. The units is million bytes.

h3cSafeCacheSelectPolicy.name: h3cSafeCacheSelectPolicy
h3cSafeCacheSelectPolicy.description: This object describes the policy about allocating the space for SafeCache.

h3cSafeCacheThreshold.name: h3cSafeCacheThreshold
h3cSafeCacheThreshold.description: This object identifies the maximal percentage of date changed before data flushing.

h3cSafeCacheFlushTime.name: h3cSafeCacheFlushTime
h3cSafeCacheFlushTime.description: This object identifies the period during which the date can stay in cache before data flushing. The units is second.

h3cSafeCacheFlushCommand.name: h3cSafeCacheFlushCommand
h3cSafeCacheFlushCommand.description: This object identifies the number of commands when data flushing.

h3cSafeCacheSkipDupWrite.name: h3cSafeCacheSkipDupWrite
h3cSafeCacheSkipDupWrite.description: This object identifies skip duplicate write commands or not.

h3cSafeCacheRunStatus.name: h3cSafeCacheRunStatus
h3cSafeCacheRunStatus.description: This object identifies the run state of the SafeCache.

h3cSafeCacheSwitch.name: h3cSafeCacheSwitch
h3cSafeCacheSwitch.description: This object identifies the action of the SafeCache. The value 'suspend' means suspend the SafeCache. The value 'resume' means resume the SafeCache.

h3cSafeCacheRowStatus.name: h3cSafeCacheRowStatus
h3cSafeCacheRowStatus.description: This object identifies the action to create or delete the SafeCache.

h3cSafeCacheDistributeTable.name: h3cSafeCacheDistributeTable
h3cSafeCacheDistributeTable.description: This table contains some entity to config the SafeCache resource.

h3cSafeCacheDistributeEntry.name: h3cSafeCacheDistributeEntry
h3cSafeCacheDistributeEntry.description: An entry containing some information applicable to SafeCache resource of the logic volume.

h3cSafeCacheDistLvIndex.name: h3cSafeCacheDistLvIndex
h3cSafeCacheDistLvIndex.description: This index is identical to h3cLvIndex in H3C-LOGIC-VOLUME-MIB.

h3cSafeCacheRaidUuid.name: h3cSafeCacheRaidUuid
h3cSafeCacheRaidUuid.description: This index is identical to h3cRaidUuid in H3C-RAID-MIB.

h3cSafeCacheRaidSize.name: h3cSafeCacheRaidSize
h3cSafeCacheRaidSize.description: This object identifies the size on the special raid distributed for the SafeCache resource.

h3cSafeCacheExtRowStatus.name: h3cSafeCacheExtRowStatus
h3cSafeCacheExtRowStatus.description: This object identifies the action to create the distribution for the SafeCache resource.

h3cMirrorConfigTable.name: h3cMirrorConfigTable
h3cMirrorConfigTable.description: This table contains some entity to config mirror.

h3cMirrorConfigEntry.name: h3cMirrorConfigEntry
h3cMirrorConfigEntry.description: An entry containing some information applicable to mirror for the logic volume.

h3cMirrorLvIndex.name: h3cMirrorLvIndex
h3cMirrorLvIndex.description: This object identifies the source logic volume of the mirror. The object identified by this index is the same object as identified by the same value of h3cLvindex. Note that an entry of h3cMirrorConfigTable can be created only when the associated h3cMirrorDistributeTable's objects is ready or the associated select policy is not equal to 'none'. If an entry is deleted, the associated h3cMirrorDistributeTable objects should be deleted automatically.

h3cMirrorType.name: h3cMirrorType
h3cMirrorType.description: This object identifies the type of the mirror.

h3cMirrorStatus.name: h3cMirrorStatus
h3cMirrorStatus.description: This object identifies the state of the mirror resource.

h3cMirrorName.name: h3cMirrorName
h3cMirrorName.description: This object identifies the name of the mirror resource. it is used when promote mirror resource.

h3cMirrorSyncPercentage.name: h3cMirrorSyncPercentage
h3cMirrorSyncPercentage.description: This object identifies the percentage of the mirror sync.

h3cMirrorSyncPerformance.name: h3cMirrorSyncPerformance
h3cMirrorSyncPerformance.description: This object identifies the performance of the mirror sync. The unit is MB/S

h3cMirrorDelta.name: h3cMirrorDelta
h3cMirrorDelta.description: This object identifies size of delta data after the last mirror sync.

h3cMirrorRaidType.name: h3cMirrorRaidType
h3cMirrorRaidType.description: This object identifies the raid type of the mirror resource.

h3cMirrorSelectPolicy.name: h3cMirrorSelectPolicy
h3cMirrorSelectPolicy.description: This object describes the policy about allocating the space for mirror resource.

h3cMirrorSwitch.name: h3cMirrorSwitch
h3cMirrorSwitch.description: This object identifies the state of the mirror. The value of 'sync' means synchronize mannually. The value of 'swap' means switch the roles of the primary resource and mirror resource. The value of 'promte' means break the mirrored pair and convert the mirror resource into an independent logic volume. The new logic volume will have all of the properties of a regular logic volume. Note that if the action of 'promte' is executed successfully, this mirror resource will become a primary logic volume, and this entry will be deleted automatically.

h3cMirrorExtendRaidUuid.name: h3cMirrorExtendRaidUuid
h3cMirrorExtendRaidUuid.description: This object identifies the raid of the mirror resource when the primary logic volume resource is extended.

h3cMirrorRowStatus.name: h3cMirrorRowStatus
h3cMirrorRowStatus.description: This object identifies the action to create or delete the mirror resource.

h3cMirrorDistributeTable.name: h3cMirrorDistributeTable
h3cMirrorDistributeTable.description: This table contains some entity to config the mirror resource.

h3cMirrorDistributeEntry.name: h3cMirrorDistributeEntry
h3cMirrorDistributeEntry.description: An entry containing some information applicable to mirror resource for the logic volume.

h3cMirrorDistLvIndex.name: h3cMirrorDistLvIndex
h3cMirrorDistLvIndex.description: This index is identical to h3cLvIndex in H3C-LOGIC-VOLUME-MIB.

h3cMirrorRaidUuid.name: h3cMirrorRaidUuid

h3cMirrorRaidSize.name: h3cMirrorRaidSize
h3cMirrorRaidSize.description: This object identifies the size on the special raid distributed for the mirror resource.

h3cMirrorExtRowStatus.name: h3cMirrorExtRowStatus
h3cMirrorExtRowStatus.description: This object identifies the action to create or delete the distribution for the mirror resource.
